analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0xc600c024a1f144dcb55cd1ff35d57ed18fe8fb5e.sol:
	Contract CommunityCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0xc600c024a1f144dcb55cd1ff35d57ed18fe8fb5e.sol#441-444)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xc600c024a1f144dcb55cd1ff35d57ed18fe8fb5e.sol#506-518) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0xc600c024a1f144dcb55cd1ff35d57ed18fe8fb5e.sol#517)
